alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 2:56PM MDT until March 30 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 5 to 10 inches, with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are possible for high- elevation routes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels initially at or above 8,500 feet elevation will drop to around 7,500 feet Monday night into Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
